about_the_game:
From precious jewels snatched by a simple cat burglar to the most elaborate robbing of a casino, there's something so thrilling about executing the ultimate heist....

Composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, Heist features an impressive line-up of swanky themes inspired by some of your favorite thief movies. Featuring music ranging from modern cyber crime, synth propelled techno chill, to Oceans 11 inspired acid jazz, some vintage cop show 70s flavored funk / R&B, and some dramatic orchestral crime-in-progress themes perfect for breaking into buildings, picking locks, or raiding the bank vaults at midnight. What are you waiting for? Grab a copy of this pack and get planning!

This pack contains:
  • 11 exciting music themes
  • 33 slots sounds - perfect for the casino floor!
  • .m4a, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Heist Music Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Heist Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
